items.sentence: I'll explain to you how to use it when I come back.
Mary is depressed because her husband has left her.
I wish I hadn't sung the third song I sang tonight.
Either stop talking or say something worth hearing.
My closet is full of junk that I never use anymore.
Tom is the sort of man anyone could get along with.
Did you make a list of things that you want to buy?
Tom says he just wants to stay here for a few days.
I don't think that Tom knows that Mary isn't happy.
I don't think that Tom knows that Mary is Canadian.
I don't think that Tom knows Mary doesn't like him.
Maybe you haven't been looking in the right places.
We went early to make sure that we could get seats.
Tom is back home in Boston living with his parents.
It was much more complicated than we first thought.
I asked whether Tom was planning to do that or not.
Tom and Mary pretended to be married to each other.
Tom said that he thought there was no life on Mars.
Tom needs to get the application form in by Monday.
What Tom thought was a wolf turned out to be a dog.
